# maxWidth

**Instance Property**

The maximum width, in pixels, of the generated barcode.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxWidth: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **alwaysSpecifyCompaction**: A Boolean value specifying whether to force compaction style.
- **compactStyle**: A Boolean value specifying whether to force compact style Aztec code.
- **compactionMode**: The compaction mode of the generated barcode.
- **correctionLevel**: The correction level ratio of the generated barcode.
- **dataColumns**: The number of data columns in the generated barcode.
- **maxHeight**: The maximum height, in pixels, of the generated barcode.
- **message**: The message to encode in the PDF417 barcode.
- **minHeight**: The minimum height, in pixels, of the generated barcode.
- **minWidth**: The minimum width, in pixels, of the generated barcode.
- **preferredAspectRatio**: The preferred aspect ratio of the generated barcode.
- **rows**: The number of rows in the generated barcode.
